Package com.cs4337.project.service

Class ChatService

java.lang.Object
com.cs4337.project.service.ChatService
@Service public class ChatService extends Object
The service class for managing users and chats. Manages functions more difficult to achieve with websockets, such as group chat creation and allocation. Controlled by: ChatRESTController

  • Method Details

    • getAllChatsForUser

      public Map<String,Object> getAllChatsForUser(Integer userId)
      Gets all info about chat's that user is part of
      Parameters:
      userId - user's id
      Returns:
      returns list of ChatInfo if user is a part of chats or a single chat. In case user don't have any chat's or userId was incorrect it should return HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND and relevant message
